DurationDurationhttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration#DurationFHIR R5 ComplexType `Duration` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions. Element `Duration` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Duration`.
http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration#QuantityFHIR R5 ComplexType `Duration` is representable via FHIR DSTU2 extensions. Element `Duration` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity`.

Element `Duration.comparator` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Duration.comparator`.
http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration#Quantity.comparatorNote that the target element context `Quantity.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `Duration.comparator` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.comparator`.

http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration#Quantity.codeElement `Duration.code` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.code`.

name: ConceptMapR5DurationElementsForR4Duration
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Duration` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions.
Element `Duration` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Duration`.

FHIR R5 ComplexType `Duration` is representable via FHIR DSTU2 extensions.
Element `Duration` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity`.
Element `Duration.value` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Duration.value`.
Element `Duration.value` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.value`.

Note that the target element context `Duration.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier.
Element `Duration.comparator` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Duration.comparator`.

Note that the target element context `Quantity.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier.
Element `Duration.comparator` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.comparator`.
Element `Duration.unit` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Duration.unit`.
Element `Duration.unit` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.unit`.
Element `Duration.system` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Duration.system`.
Element `Duration.system` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.system`.
Element `Duration.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Duration.code`.
Element `Duration.code` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.code`.
